column4: Hi, I have ubuntu 10.40 LTS installed on my Pentium 4 2.8ghz system and when I update the kernel, it sometimes goes into an information screen and I have to restart the computer
thats right, you need to reboot to boot to the new kernel
so after you reboot you are told the OS needs to reboot?
